projects.name: Anonymo
projects.description: Developed a dynamic full-stack social media application using React JS for the frontend, integrating with Appwrite as the backend service, and styled with Tailwind CSS for a modern UI. Implemented key features such as user authentication, post creation, like and comment functionalities, and real-time updates using React Query for efficient state management. Leveraged Appwrite for backend services, including user management and database operations, showcasing proficiency in integrating and utilizing third-party services. Demonstrated deployment skills by successfully hosting the application on a cloud platform, ensuring scalability and accessibility, and achieving 10% improvement in performance metrics.

projects.name: Mr. Typer
projects.description: Developed a full-stack typing service using React JS for the frontend, Node.js with Express.js for the backend, and MongoDB for database storage. Implemented a real-time typing interface with Socket.IO, allowing users to see live updates as they type. Incorporated features such as user authentication, text storage, and sharing functionalities. Ensured scalability and performance by optimizing database queries and server-side logic, resulting in a responsive and efficient service.
